_header: Swart smoked smiths smattered with smoke
_description: A satire against the blacksmiths — twenty-two long alliterative lines

BLAru292.First Lines:
Swarte smekyd smeþes smateryd with smokedrue me to deth wyth
                    den of her dyntes…
BLAru292.Last Lines:
…Alle cloyd merys cryst hem gyue sorwemay no man for
                    brenwateris on nyghe hau hys rest
